mapper.select: select id, question_id, exam_paper_user_id, answer, `right`, score, points, previous, `next`, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by from exam_paper_detail where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into exam_paper_detail(question_id, exam_paper_user_id, answer, `right`, score, points, previous, `next`, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by) values (#{questionId}, #{examPaperUserId}, #{answer}, #{right}, #{score}, #{points}, #{previous}, #{next}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, now(), #{updateBy})

insert into exam_paper_detail(question_id, exam_paper_user_id, answer, `right`, score, points, previous, `next`, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by) values
(#{entity.questionId}, #{entity.examPaperUserId}, #{entity.answer}, #{entity.right}, #{entity.score}, #{entity.points}, #{entity.previous}, #{entity.next}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.createBy}, now(), #{entity.updateBy})

insert into exam_paper_detail(question_id, exam_paper_user_id, answer, `right`, score, points, previous, `next`, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by) values
(#{entity.questionId}, #{entity.examPaperUserId}, #{entity.answer}, #{entity.right}, #{entity.score}, #{entity.points}, #{entity.previous}, #{entity.next}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.createBy}, now(), #{entity.updateBy})
on duplicate key update question_id = values(question_id), exam_paper_user_id = values(exam_paper_user_id), answer = values(answer), right = values(right), score = values(score), points = values(points), previous = values(previous), next = values(next), create_time = values(create_time), create_by = values(create_by), update_time = values(update_time), update_by = values(update_by)
mapper.update:
update exam_paper_detail
question_id = #{questionId},
exam_paper_user_id = #{examPaperUserId},
answer = #{answer},
`right` = #{right},
score = #{score},
points = #{points},
previous = #{previous},
`next` = #{next},
create_time = #{createTime},
create_by = #{createBy},
update_time = now(),
update_by = #{updateBy},
where id = #{id}
